thread.title: Demi Lovato, Halsey And Other Celebs Who Rocked Their Cleavage At The Grammys
thread.title_full: Demi Lovato, Halsey And Other Celebs Who Rocked Their Cleavage At The Grammys

author: Jamie LeeLo
title: Demi Lovato, Halsey And Other Celebs Who Rocked Their Cleavage At The Grammys
text:
Like Us On Facebook Like Us On Facebook 
Ah yes, the Grammys. The time of year when the world comes together to celebrate the continually uniting and unanimously adored world of music, melody and, of course, cleavage. 
Stars TURNED UP AND TURNED OUT this year and so did their number one (and two) ladies. 
Hey, if you’ve got it — flaunt it.That’s what I ALWAYS say. 
OK, you caught me; that’s me and my dog, not a celebrity. 
Here are the celebrities. Let’s start with the OG queen of pop, the one, the only — Ms. Britney Spears. REX/Shutterstock 
HALLO LADY(s)! 
Britney (bitch) hit the carpet in a jaw-dropping sheer mini dress, and no one was mad. “Confident” singer Demi Lovato also arrived, bringing her amazing chest — we mean — confidence with her. REX/Shutterstock 
In an otherwise fairly modest long-sleeved, slim-fitting gown, Demi decided to accentuate her toned, contoured cleavage — and, like, not that I would ever tell this bad-ass lady what to do, but I am just going to say SHE MADE THE RIGHT CHOICE. 
— Elite Daily (@EliteDaily) February 13, 2017 Next, we have the always fearless, endlessly inspiring and terrifying (in a good way) Lady Gaga. REX/Shutterstock 
Leave it to Mother Monster to throw convention out the window and rock UNDERBOOB instead of INSIDE BOOB. Lady Gaga flashes flesh & arrives with Metallica to Grammys To view this video please enable JavaScript, and considerupgrading to a web browser that supports HTML5 video 
What? Inside boob isn’t what the kids are calling it these days? “Closer” singer Halsey had us all wanting to get closer to her. REX/Shutterstock 
Not to mention, the silky PJs didn’t look like the worst thing we’ve ever seen, and TBH she looks more comfortable than I feel sitting in my sweatshirt right now. Halsey takes the plunge in open blue button down at Grammys To view this video please enable JavaScript, and considerupgrading to a web browser that supports HTML5 video And, of course, anyone who tuned into the E! Red Carpet couldn’t help but get an eyeful of Tinashe and her fashion wonder. REX/Shutterstock 
And to her, we say, bravo, babe. BRAVO. 
If you need me, I’ll be over here watching the rest of the evening dipping french fries in frosting thinking about buying a push-up bra on Amazon. 
Happy Grammying!
